description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Kedah, Malaysia. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Glorious Malaysia Beachfront Paradise with Onsite Spa
hotels.description: The blonde sandy beaches of Malaysia are calling you to a stay at PARKROYAL Langkawi Resort, an immaculate beachfront oasis. Experience true island paradise in this idyllic destination, with days basking in the fabulous tropical sunshine, lounging by the infinity pool and enjoying a cocktail or two at the swim-up bar - all while gazing out at the crystal-clear waters of Pantai Tengah beach. Set your body clock to island time with bespoke spa treatments, thrilling water activities and delicious dining.

seo.title: Hotel a Kedah - Malaysia Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trova i migliori hotel a Kedah, Malaysia con offerte esclusive. Prenota la tua fuga perfetta con fino al 60% di sconto.
